ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 58 - which (a) DECLARES the severe spring run-off and flooding which occured in British Columbia in 2002, to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
